case.title: Married and looking... - 30 (NY)
case.text: Married and not looking to change my current status neither yours. Loking for long term ongoing relationship with sane, D/D free, discreet, down to earth, mature, married man. I prefer someone Caucasian, from NYC, between 35-45 years old, taller than 5'10. If you don't fit my description, please don't bother. One liners will be ignored. My post is real and if you don't hear from me then you didn't pique my interest.
